text: aur jis din ham un sabako ikattha karenge, phir un logon se, jinhonne shirk kiya hoga, kahenge, "apanee jagah thahare raho tum bhee aur tumhaare saajheedaar bhee." phir ham unake beech alagaav paida kar denge, aur unake thaharae hue saajheedaar kahenge, "tum hamaaree to hamaaree bandagee nahin karate the
